template.name: Template App Oracle Database
template.description: Template for Oracle database monitoring end-point It used for monitoring from Management host with installed Zabbix agent Instance name has to be updated in MACROS section

item.name: Date of the last successful database backup
Hours since the last successful database backup
Date of the last successful log backup
Hours since the last successful log backup
Maximum amount of processes for this database
Processes (json)
item.description: Information about database's processes in JSON format: maximum possible amount current amount percentage of utilization

trigger_prototype.name: PDB {#PDB_NAME} is in invalid state ({ITEM.VALUE1})
trigger_prototype.description: PDB is not in READ/WRITE mode

discovery_rule.name: PDBs tablespaces
discovery_rule.description: List all tablespaces for all tablespaces

item_prototype.name: Backup mode duration of {#TABLESPACE_NAME} tablespace, PDB {#PDB_NAME}

trigger_prototype.name: Tablespace "{#TABLESPACE_NAME}" in PDB {#PDB_NAME} is in backup mode for more then {$BACKUP_MODE_WARNING} hours ({ITEM.VALUE1})
Used more than {$TBS_HIGH}%( {ITEM.VALUE1}) of available space on {#TABLESPACE_NAME}, PDB {#PDB_NAME}
Used more than {$TBS_WARNING}%({ITEM.VALUE1}) of available space on {#TABLESPACE_NAME}, PDB {#PDB_NAME}
Status of standby database {#STANDBY_DEST} is invalid ({ITEM.VALUE})
Tablespace "{#TABLESPACE_NAME}" is in backup mode for more then {$BACKUP_MODE_WARNING} hours ({ITEM.VALUE1})
Used more than {$TBS_HIGH}%( {ITEM.VALUE1}) of available space on {#TABLESPACE_NAME}
Used more than {$TBS_WARNING}%({ITEM.VALUE1}) of available space on {#TABLESPACE_NAME}

trigger.name: Amount of processes exceeded threshold {$PROCESSES_HIGH} % ({ITEM.VALUE1})
trigger.description: Utilization of current processes exceeded threshold percentage

trigger.name: FRA used space exceeded {$FRA_HIGH} % ({ITEM.VALUE1})
trigger.description: FRA used space exceeded HIGH threshold

trigger.name: FRA used space exceeded {$FRA_WARNING} % ({ITEM.VALUE1})
trigger.description: FRA used space exceeded WARNING threshold

trigger.name: No database backups for the last {ITEM.VALUE} hours (treshold {$HOURS_SINCE_LAST_DB_BACKUP} hours)
No logs backups for the last {ITEM.VALUE} hours (treshold {$HOURS_SINCE_LAST_LOG_BACKUP} hours)
